typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Employee Name} as string,
		gender as string,
		dob as date,
		zipcode as long,
		employment_status as string,
		education as string,
		{Patient id} as long,
		marital_status as string,
		children as integer,
		ancestry as string,
		avg_commute as decimal(8,2),
		daily_internet_use as decimal(8,2),
		available_vehicles as integer,
		military_service as boolean,
		disease as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> MedicalData
MedicalData split(equals(employment_status,"retired"),
	equals(employment_status,"employed"),
	equals(employment_status,"student"),
	disjoint: false) ~> EmployementStatus@(Retired, Employed, Student, Unemployed)
EmployementStatus@Retired sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MedicalData(retired).csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkRetired
EmployementStatus@Employed sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MedicalData(employed).csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkEmployed
EmployementStatus@Student sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MedicalData(student).csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkStudent
EmployementStatus@Unemployed sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MedicalData(unemployed).csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkUnemployed
